text: @DrFullertonMPP No, we all shouldn’t do our part. The people in charge should do their part. ‘We all’ can’t visit our loved ones due to COVID19. People are DEAD as a result of YOUR negligence and YOUR deregulation. REPEAT: people are dead. Shame on you and @fordnation #ResignMerrillee #cdnpoli
